name: Abe's Mission: Escape
overview: Abe's Escape Mission is a game in the genre of adventure platformer, developed by the Brothers group (Vladivostok) for the contest Your Game 1 and took first place out of six works on it. The development of the game was started on December 10, 2001 and completed on July 30, 2002. The game is based on the popular Oddworld game: Abe's Oddysee, developed by Oddworld Inhabitants in 1997 for Sony PlayStation and PC / Windows, and is its simplified implementation on the ZX Spectrum.
